text: haey yeung minban bangkeut mekh cheachraen chean ning phendei haeyning avei del nowchanloh vea teangpir noh laey leuklengte mean moulheto troemotrauv bonnaoh . haey pitabrakd nasa thngai barlok nung chhean mokadl cheaminkhan . hetonih chaur anak( mou ham meat) anoukroh( dl puok mou sh ri ki n) nouv kar anoukroh muoy da laobrapei
